doc:
Paul Danquah https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Danquah 0 Paul Danquah, born Joseph Paul Walcott (25 May 1925 – 13 August 2015), was a British film actor, known particularly for his role in the film A Taste of Honey (1961), adapted from the 1958 play of the same name written by Shelagh Delaney. He later became a barrister and a bank consultant. His father was the Ghanaian statesman J. B. Danquah. Paul_Danquah , born Joseph_Paul_Walcott ( 25_May_1925 – 13_August_2015 ) , was a_British_film_actor , known particularly for his_role in the_film A_Taste of Honey ( 1961 ) , adapted from the_1958_play of the_same_name written by Shelagh_Delaney . He later became a_barrister and a_bank_consultant . His_father was the_Ghanaian_statesman_J._B._Danquah .
